targets.rawSql:
select 
age(time,timeb)
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - counternumber+1) as "countertwobone"



from (select time_stamp,price_eur,price_usd,market_cap_eur,(select counternumber from (select time_stamp, (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counternumber" from "$Coin" group by time_stamp) as qry where time_stamp = '$CompareDate') from $Coin) as values



group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur,counternumber
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone
WHERE counter = 1

SELECT
  (select max(time_stamp) from $Coin) as "Latest Price from",
  price_eur as "EUR:",
  price_usd as "USD:"
FROM
  "$Coin"
ORDER BY time_stamp asc

select 
(("$Coin eur"/"$Coin eurb")-1)*100 as "EUR Entry Delta %"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  price_usd as "$Coin usd",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur,price_usd
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  price_usd as "$Coin usdb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - counternumber+1) as "countertwobone"

from (select time_stamp,price_eur,price_usd,market_cap_eur,(select counternumber from (select time_stamp, (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counternumber" from "$Coin" group by time_stamp) as qry where time_stamp = '$CompareDate') from $Coin) as values

group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur,price_usd,counternumber
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone
ORDER BY countertwo ASC

select "$Coin eur" - "$Coin eurb" as "EUR Entry Delta"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  price_usd as "$Coin usd",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur,price_usd
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  price_usd as "$Coin usdb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - counternumber+1) as "countertwobone"

from (select time_stamp,price_eur,price_usd,market_cap_eur,(select counternumber from (select time_stamp, (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counternumber" from "$Coin" group by time_stamp) as qry where time_stamp = '$CompareDate') from $Coin) as values

group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur,price_usd,counternumber
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone
ORDER BY countertwo ASC

select
(select distinct time_stamp from $Coin where time_stamp = '$$CompareDate') as "Compare Values from: ",
"$Coin eurb" as "EUR:",
"$Coin usdb" as "USD:"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  price_usd as "$Coin usdb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - counternumber+1) as "countertwobone"

from (select time_stamp,price_eur,price_usd,market_cap_eur,(select counternumber from (select time_stamp, (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counternumber" from "$Coin" group by time_stamp) as qry where time_stamp = '$CompareDate') from $Coin) as values


group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur,price_usd,counternumber
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone
ORDER BY countertwo ASC

select time,
"$Coin eur" - "$Coin eurb" as "EUR Entry Delta",
(("$Coin eur"/"$Coin eurb")-1)*100 as "EUR Entry Delta %",
"$Coin usd" - "$Coin usdb" as "USD Entry Delta",
(("$Coin usd"/"$Coin usdb")-1)*100 as "USD Entry Delta %"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  price_usd as "$Coin usd",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur,price_usd
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  price_usd as "$Coin usdb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - counternumber+1) as "countertwobone"

from (select time_stamp,price_eur,price_usd,market_cap_eur,(select counternumber from (select time_stamp, (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counternumber" from "$Coin" group by time_stamp) as qry where time_stamp = '$CompareDate') from $Coin) as values

group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur,price_usd,counternumber
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone
ORDER BY countertwo ASC

select cast(ups as decimal) / downs as "Up / Down Ratio", ups, downs, ups+downs as "total datapoints", upssum as "total up value", downssum as "total down value", upssum + downssum as "Total Balance"
from
(select (select count(delta) as ups
from (select time,
"$Coin eur" - "$Coin eurb" as "delta"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - $DeltaDifference) as "countertwobone"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone) as deltatable
where time > '$CompareDate' and delta >= 0),


(select sum(delta) as upssum
from (select time,
"$Coin eur" - "$Coin eurb" as "delta"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - $DeltaDifference) as "countertwobone"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone) as deltatable
where time > '$CompareDate' and delta >= 0),







(select count(delta) as downs
from (select time,
"$Coin eur" - "$Coin eurb" as "delta"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - $DeltaDifference) as "countertwobone"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone) as deltatable
where time > '$CompareDate' and delta < 0),

(select sum(delta) as downssum
from (select time,
"$Coin eur" - "$Coin eurb" as "delta"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - $DeltaDifference) as "countertwobone"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone) as deltatable
where time > '$CompareDate' and delta < 0)



) as updowntable

select time_stamp as time, price_eur
from $Coin
order by time_stamp asc

select time,
"$Coin eur" - "$Coin eurb" as "Compare Date = $CompareDate Entry Delta"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - counternumber+1) as "countertwobone"
from (select time_stamp,price_eur,price_usd,market_cap_eur,(select counternumber from (select time_stamp, (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counternumber" from "$Coin" group by time_stamp) as qry where time_stamp = '$CompareDate') from $Coin) as values
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur,counternumber
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone

select time,
"$Coin eur" - "$Coin eurb" as "DeltaDifference = $DeltaDifference Entry Delta"
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - $DeltaDifference) as "countertwobone"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone

list.definition:
select 
timeb as comparetime
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwobone"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone
order by counter asc
list.name: CompareDate
list.query:
select 
timeb as comparetime
From(select
  time_stamp as "time",
  price_eur as "$Coin eur",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eur",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coins",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entry",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counter",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwo"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableA
INNER JOIN (select
  time_stamp as "timeb",
  price_eur as "$Coin eurb",
  market_cap_eur as "$Coin market cap eurb",
  market_cap_eur / price_eur as "$Coin # of coinsb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp)) as "# Database Entryb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc)) as "counterb",
  (row_number() OVER(order by time_stamp desc) - 1) as "countertwobone"
from "$Coin"
group by time_stamp,price_eur,market_cap_eur
order by time_stamp asc) AS derivedTableB
ON counter = countertwobone
order by counter asc
